snippet: The question for Marcus Samuelsson, the chef, restaurateur, author, food impresario and media personality, is how far and how fast he can expand his personal brand.
abstract: Marcus Samuelsson is a chef, restaurateur, author, food impresario and media personality, who opened his acclaimed Manhattan restaurant Red Rooster in 2010; his growing, multimillion-dollar enterprise employs more than 700 people as he tries to balance the culinary and the commercial; he wants to bring a sense of democracy to dining and to ensure high-quality food in multiple price categories.
lead_paragraph: The question for Marcus Samuelsson, the chef, restaurateur, author, food impresario and media personality, is how far and how fast he can expand his personal brand.

headline.seo: Marcus Samuelsson, Both a Chef and a Brand
headline.main: Marcus Samuelsson, a Chef, a Brand and Then Some
headline.print_headline: A Chef, a Brand And Then Some
